name: Reese's Chewy Chocolate Cookies
author: Louise Alderman
instructions: Heat oven to 350°. Grease 15 1⁄2 x 10 1/2 x 1 inch jelly roll pan. In large bowl, beat butter and sugar until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla; beat well. Stir together flour, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Gradually blend into butter mixture. Stir in peanut butter chips. Spread batter into pan. Bake 20 minutes or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. Cut into bars.
